name: ocl-js
description: Object Constraint Language parser written in JavaScript.

scripts.build:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run generate:parser && npm run webpack -- --config webpack.config.js --progress --profile --bail
scripts.clean: npm cache verify && npm run rimraf -- node_modules dist lib
scripts.test: npm run generate:parser &&  node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register test/**/*.spec.js

author: Stephan KÃ¶ninger <ocl.js@stekoe.de>
